duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a liaison between the line and service staff to ensure timely and accurate order fulfillment.
Ensure all orders are prepared and presented according to standards, including plate presentation and garnishing.
Restock the window with plates, bowls, and other required tools for efficient service.
Interact with Members/Guests professionally, assisting with changes and last-minute requests.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent preferred
